scriptmanager.scripts.File_Utilities

Class ConvertChrNames

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.File_Utilities.ConvertChrNames

  • public class ConvertChrNames
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to contain all static chromosome name conversion methods. Primarily a utility for renaming sacCer3 chromosomes in coordinate files between the two alternative chromosome naming systems.
    Author:
    Olivia Lang
    See Also:
    ConvertBEDChrNamesCLI, ConvertGFFChrNamesCLI, ConvertBEDChrNamesWindow, ConvertGFFChrNamesWindow

    • Method Detail

      • getR2A

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getR2A(boolean useChrmt)
        Helper method to generate the roman --> arabic numeral chromosome name map.
        Parameters:
        useChrmt - if true, include "chrM" --> "chrmt" map, else include "chrmt" --> "chrM" map
        Returns:
        the string for the arabic numeral chrname mapped to the analagous roman numeral chrname with mitochondrial chr map

      • getA2R

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getA2R(boolean useChrmt)
        Helper method to generate the arabic --> roman numeral chromosome name map.
        Parameters:
        useChrmt - if true, include "chrM" --> "chrmt" map, else include "chrmt" --> "chrM" map
        Returns:
        the string for the arabic numeral chrname mapped to the analagous roman numeral chrname with mitochondrial chr map

      • convert_RomantoArabic

        public static void convert_RomantoArabic(java.io.File input,
                                         java.io.File out_filepath,
                                         boolean useChrmt,
                                         boolean gzOutput)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for convertCoordinateFile using Roman --> Arabic chromosome name map.
        Parameters:
        input - the input BED/GFF file to convert
        out_filepath - this is the filepath to write the converted coordinate file to
        useChrmt - Used to generate the chromosome map for the conversion (see getR2A()).
        gzOutput - If this is true, the output file will be gzipped.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convert_ArabictoRoman

        public static void convert_ArabictoRoman(java.io.File input,
                                         java.io.File out_filepath,
                                         boolean useChrmt,
                                         boolean gzOutput)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Wrapper for convertCoordinateFile using Arabic --> Roman chromosome name map.
        Parameters:
        input - the input BED/GFF file to convert
        out_filepath - this is the filepath to write the converted coordinate file to
        useChrmt - Used to generate the chromosome map for the conversion (see getA2R()).
        gzOutput - If this is true, the output file will be gzipped.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • convertCoordinateFile

        public static void convertCoordinateFile(java.io.File input,
                                         java.io.File out_filepath,
                                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> chrMap,
                                         boolean gzOutput)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Convert method for tab-delimited coordinate files. Note that both BED and GFF implementations are the same. If chr name not in provided HashMap (chrMap), then the coordinate is written to match the original.
        Parameters:
        input - the input coordinate BED/GFF file (chr info in first column of tab-delimited file)
        out_filepath - the new output coordinate file with the exchanged chr names
        chrMap - the HashMap for which conversion direction to implement
        gzOutput - If this is true, the output file will be gzipped.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
